#!/bin/ash
# Vanilla MC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

curl https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/1.21.4/builds/82/downloads/paper-1.21.4-82.jar -O

# Set the GitHub repository owner and repo name
REPO_OWNER="sjdodge123"
REPO_NAME="MetalCraft"
DEST_DIR="/mnt/server"

# Fetch the latest release information using GitHub API
LATEST_RELEASE=$(curl -s "https://api.github.com/repos/$REPO_OWNER/$REPO_NAME/releases/latest")

# Extract the tarball URL for the latest release
TARBALL_URL=$(echo "$LATEST_RELEASE" | jq -r '.tarball_url')

# If no tarball URL is found, exit the script
if [[ -z "$TARBALL_URL" ]]; then
  echo "Error: Could not find the tarball URL in the latest release."
  exit 1
fi

# Download the tarball using curl
echo "Downloading the latest release tarball..."
curl -L -o "$REPO_NAME-latest.tar.gz" "$TARBALL_URL"

# Create the destination directory if it doesn't exist
mkdir -p "$DEST_DIR"

# Extract the tarball directly into the destination directory
echo "Extracting the tarball into $DEST_DIR..."
tar --strip-components=1 -xvzf "$REPO_NAME-latest.tar.gz" -C "$DEST_DIR"

# Clean up by removing the tarball
rm "$REPO_NAME-latest.tar.gz"

echo "Download and extraction complete. Files are located in $DEST_DIR."
